snippet: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen has bought the recipes for many of the dishes served in its restaurants from Diversified Foods and Seasonings, based in Louisiana, for $43 million.
abstract: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen purchases recipes for many of its dishes served in its restaurants from its spice supplier, Diversified Foods and Seasonings, for $43 million.
lead_paragraph: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen has bought the recipes for many of the dishes served in its restaurants from Diversified Foods and Seasonings, based in Louisiana, for $43 million.

headline.main: Popeyes Buys Recipes From Its Spice Supplier
headline.print_headline: Popeyes Buys Recipes From Its Spice Supplier
